author: Anonymous Atom
title: lecture recording
question: I remember professor said we can watch the recording or last year lecture, but I can not find them on canvas. Does anyone know where to watch them for review goal?
student_answer: I think they are only given to students who contact cpsc 110 admin about needing to miss a lecture. Therefore, it will act as their primary lecture in that case.
instructor_answer: We will be sharing more information about this on Piazza today.
